title: SEC Under Pressure to Implement Agenda in 2022, While Democrats Control Congress
sub_head: After talking up an ambitious agenda, SEC Chairman Gensler is expected to begin implementing changes
body:
WASHINGTONâ€”Securities and Exchange Commission Chairman Gary Gensler spent his first nine months on the job sketching out ambitious plans to tighten federal regulation of Wall Street.
Now, the clock is ticking for him to implement his agenda.
